intent_atoms.description: Research logging must be persistent and deduplicated across CLI and UI consumers.
Introduce ResearchLogEntry/ResearchLogWriter infrastructure and extend ParsePipeline to record unknown boxes using contextual metadata.
CLI users can configure research log handling via the --research-log option and receive a default location announcement.
The CLI must surface the research log path before streaming events.
Research logging schema usage should be monitored as UI components evolve beyond current scaffold.

functional_units.name: Persistent Research Log Storage
functional_units.description: Stores research log entries as deduplicated JSON files shared by CLI and UI consumers.

functional_units.name: CLI Research Log Configuration
functional_units.description: Provides a --research-log option to configure the path of the research log and announces default location.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogEntry/Writer Infrastructure
functional_units.description: Defines data structures and writer components for creating and recording research log entries.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Extension for Unknown Boxes
functional_units.description: Extends the parsing pipeline to record unknown boxes using contextual metadata into the research log.

functional_units.name: CLI Environment Provisioning of Log Writers
functional_units.description: Sets up research log writers in the CLI environment based on parsed flags and surfaces the log path before streaming events.
